languages.text: "Служи Императору сердцем и делом в рядах Его светлейшего войска — Астра Милитарум!"

traits.locale_text: "Служи Императору сердцем и делом в рядах Его светлейшего войска — Астра Милитарум!"

languages.text: "Serve the Emperor in your heart and deeds when you join the ranks of His illustrious army, the Astra Militarum!"
languages.original_text: "Служи Императору сердцем и делом в рядах Его светлейшего войска — Астра Милитарум!"

traits.locale_text: "Serve the Emperor in your heart and your deeds when you join the ranks of His illustrious army, the Astra Militarum!"
"Serve the Emperor in your heart and your deeds when you join the ranks of His illustrious army, the Astra Militarum!"

"Serve the Emperor in your heart and deeds when you join the ranks of His illustrious army, the Astra Militarum!"
"Serve the Emperor in your heart and deeds when you join the ranks of His illustrious army, the Astra Militarum!"
"Serve the Emperor in your heart and deeds when you join the ranks of His illustrious army, the Astra Militarum!"

languages.text: "Dient dem Imperator im Herzen und mit Euren Taten, indem Ihr Euch den Reihen seiner erlauchten Armee anschließt, dem Astra Militarum!"
languages.original_text: "Serve the Emperor in your heart and deeds when you join the ranks of His illustrious army, the Astra Militarum!"

traits.locale_text: "Dient dem Imperator im Herzen und mit Euren Taten, indem Ihr Euch den Reihen seiner erlauchten Armee anschließt, dem Astra Militarum!"

languages.text: « Servez l'Empereur dans votre cœur et par vos actions en rejoignant les rangs de Son illustre armée, l'Astra Militarum ! »
languages.original_text: "Serve the Emperor in your heart and deeds when you join the ranks of His illustrious army, the Astra Militarum!"

traits.locale_text: « Servez l'Empereur dans votre cœur et par vos actions en rejoignant les rangs de Son illustre armée, l'Astra Militarum ! »

languages.text: “加入神圣的星界军！用你的意志与行动为帝皇服务！”
languages.original_text: "Serve the Emperor in your heart and deeds when you join the ranks of His illustrious army, the Astra Militarum!"

traits.locale_text: “加入神圣的星界军！用你的意志与行动为帝皇服务！”

languages.text: 「あの方の輝かしい軍隊、帝国防衛軍の兵士となって、あなた様の心と行いの中におられる皇帝陛下にお仕えしましょう！」
languages.original_text: "Serve the Emperor in your heart and deeds when you join the ranks of His illustrious army, the Astra Militarum!"

traits.locale_text: 「あの方の輝かしい軍隊、帝国防衛軍の兵士となって、あなたの心と行いの中におられる皇帝陛下にお仕えしましょう！」

languages.text: «Dedíquese a servir al Emperador uniéndose a las filas de su ilustre ejército, ¡el Astra Militarum!».
languages.original_text: "Serve the Emperor in your heart and deeds when you join the ranks of His illustrious army, the Astra Militarum!"

traits.locale_text: «Dedíquese a servir al Emperador uniéndose a las filas de su ilustre ejército, ¡el Astra Militarum!».

languages.text: "Haşmetli ordusu Astra Militarum'a katılarak İmparator'a hem ruhun hem de bedeninle hizmet et!"
languages.original_text: "Serve the Emperor in your heart and deeds when you join the ranks of His illustrious army, the Astra Militarum!"

traits.locale_text: "Haşmetli ordusu Astra Militarum'a katılarak İmparator'a hem ruhun hem de bedeninle hizmet et!"
